name: Tower of Destiny: LD 42
description:
Enter the tower! Defeat the wizard! Face your destiny!

Z to attack. Arrow keys move. Double tap an arrow key to dash. Press x to restart if you die.

The restart feature is super wonky and doesn’t reset the map tiles, so if you want a full board again, you’ll have to reboot the game. Also, the dash move is on a cool down timer that I didn’t get to tune as much as I would have liked and I didn’t get a chance to put in an indicator for it. I think it’s about a 1 second gap between dashes

Made with PICO-8 at the RVA Game Jams (https://rvagamejams.com/) Ludum Dare 42 event. This is my first full, complete game I’ve made by myself. Hope you like it.

PICO-8: https://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php
